page.title: 03TOURISM AND LONGNEWTON
page.content: LONGNEWTON IS A{SMALL VILLAGE}JUST OUTSIDE STOCKTON.IT HAS A NEW RESIDENTIAL AREA AND AN OLD FARMING COMMUNITY.THE POPULATION IS ABOUT{1000 {PEOPLE. THERE IS A{VILLAGE SHOP}WHERE YOU CAN BUY SWEETS,CIGARETTES,FOOD AND DRINKS.THE SHOP IS ALSO A{POST-OFFICE WHERE YOU CAN BUY STAMPS,PAY BILLS AND PUT MONEY IN THE BANK. PEOPLE HAVE TELEVISIONS AND RADIOS TO GET TO KNOW THE NEWS.ANOTHER WAY OF GETTING NEWS IS BY{THE LONGNEWTON & {ELTON NEWS SHEET}.THIS TELLS US ABOUT THE LOCAL NEWS.THE VILLAGE HAS ONE PUBLIC TELEPHONE BOX,TWO POST BOXES AND ONE PARK. THERE IS ALSO 2 PUBS WHERE YOU CAN BUY ALCOHOLIC DRINKS AND SNACKS.{THE {COMMUNITY CENTRE}AND{THE WILSON {INSTITUTE}ARE WHERE DISCOES,BADMINTON, BRIDGE,WINE AND YOUTH CLUBS ARE HELD.
